item.title: A Lesson in Using Nuance to Minimize Anti Semitism Provided by The Nation
item.description: A family member wrote me “This is interesting and nuanced Jeremy Corbyn and the Crisis of Anti-Semitism” by D.D. Guttenplan. This will be my response. It is indeed a nuanced if generous article. The simplest problem is a great many incidents of classical anti-Semitism in labor are left out. My biggest issue with this is that the scale of the problem is minimized. D.D. Guttenplan includes only a few of countless incidents and then presents the case of a anti Zionist being expelled drawing a false ratio.
